overview: Is forever really forever? Who cares when this group of hot cuties pledge their love – they’re only doing it to get a slice of the action! Eleven toned and ripped studs whisper sweet nothings into their partner’s ear and it has the desired effect! Is it love or lust on their minds as mouths water and cocks harden and asses ache to be tongue fucked and plowed! Two hours of bare skin on skin action that sees these horny guys fall in love all over again!
title: Forever with Love 2
